1173570.name: Space Robinson - Soundtrack
1173570.description:
This is a Soundtrack for Space Robinson.

Once you download the music, it will be stored in Steam\steamapps\common\Space Robinson\Soundtrack

This package includes:
Space Robinson - Alien Dawn
Space Robinson - Crystalline Light
Space Robinson - Dangerous Place
Space Robinson - Final Fight
Space Robinson - Hidden Treasure
Space Robinson - Main Theme (Fanfare)
Space Robinson - Main Theme
Space Robinson - Mountain Peaks
Space Robinson - New Home
Space Robinson - Night Battle
Space Robinson - Rainbow Chase
Space Robinson - Second Day
Space Robinson - The End

Enjoy the music!
1173570.supported_languages: 英语, 俄语, 简体中文
